ComicInfo.Summary:
The qualifying matches in China are almost finished and only 3 spots are reserved for the Finals. One spot will be earned for the winner between Dhalsim and Adon and the other 2 spots for Chun Li and Fei Long if they survive their handicap matches. It's all or nothing!
Street Fighter IV Bonus:
The story of El Fuerte, the Mexican wrestler, and what happened when T. Hawk insulted El Fuerte's idol: Rainbow Mika!
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/street-fighter-ii-turbo-3/4000-149292/
